source.a8f678ec:
# 2.drop columns with high missing values
DSJ.drop(['Salary', 'Type', 'Type13','starrating', 'View', 'Keywords5','Industry_Type_2','Employment_Type'], axis=1, inplace=True)
source.ee22c6d9:
# 3.Extracting only the minimum required years of experience
#Min_experience
DSJ.Min_Exp=DSJ.Min_Exp.str.split('-').str[0]
source.19526c04:
#Identifying similiar cities with different names and renaming them
DSJ.Location.replace({'Banaglore' : 'Bengaluru','Gurgaon Gurugram' : 'Gurgaon','Delhi NCR' :'Delhi' }, inplace=True)
DSJ.Location.replace(['Not specified','India','india','Remote','Multiple'], 'Not Specified', inplace=True)
DSJ.Location.replace(['Navi Mumbai','Mumbai Suburbs'], 'Mumbai', inplace=True)
source.f114fac4:
#Skills required
Skills=DSJ.Skill1.append([DSJ.Skill2,DSJ.Skill3,DSJ.Skill4,DSJ.Skill5,DSJ.Skll6,DSJ.Skill7,DSJ.Skill8])
Skills=Skills.str.lower() #Converting all the entries to lower case
Skills.value_counts()
source.c2d5ee07:
Locs=pd.DataFrame(data=DSJ.Location.value_counts())
Locs.reset_index(inplace=True)
Locs.columns=['Location','counts']
# import plotly.express as px
fig = px.pie(Locs, values='counts', names='Location')
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside', textinfo='percent+label')
fig.show()
source.faf58b1a:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,5))
ax=sns.countplot(x=DSJ.Min_Exp, palette='Set1')
total = len(DSJ)
for p in ax.patches:
    percentage = f'{100 * p.get_height() / total:.1f}%\n'
    x = p.get_x() + p.get_width() / 2
    y = p.get_height()
    ax.annotate(percentage, (x, y), ha='center', va='center')
# plt.tight_layout
plt.show()

fig.show()
source.13243591:

fig.update_traces(textposition='inside', textinfo='percent+label')
fig.show()

source.66bc0a05:
This analysis is done by webscraping data from a job portal using Octoparse software. A total of 565 entries are extracted and Exploratory Data Analysis is done on the dataset.

The objective of the analysis is to identify notable insights and trends in Data Science related jobs.
source.1f51b3d0:
Columns to be handled

1 Title- Not relevant    
2 Title2- Change the heading to 'Company'    
3 starrating-drop (High percentage of missing values)       
4 View- drop (High percentage of missing values)             
5 Keywords- Experience: Extract the minimum year required, change the heading to Min_Exp         
6 Salary- Drop (High percentage of 'Not disclosed' values)           
7 Location- Extract the first word and identify similiar cities havinig different name  
8 Keywords5-Drop        
9 Skill 1-8 - Consolidate all the skillls and do a separate analysis                       
17 Type- (High percentage of missing values)            
18 Type13- Drop(Not relevant)            
19 Role- Remove rows with missing values              
20 Industry_Type_1- Remove rows with missing values   
21 Industry_Type_2- Drop (Not relevant)   
22 Functional_Area- Remove rows with missing values   
23 Employment_Type- Remove rows with missing values   
24 Role_Category- Remove rows with missing values
